name: Cucumber and Watercress Sandwich Appetizers
author: sal
summary: These little sandwiches make great appetizers. A delicious cucumber spread and watercress provide the filling.
ingredients: 8 cups cucumber, peeled and finely chopped
20 slices whole wheat bread, crusts removed
2 cups trimmed and coarsely chopped watercress
directions: Place cucumber in a medium bowl
Cover and set aside for approximately 30 minutes
Mix ground black pepper, chives and butter into the bowl with the cucumber
Spread whole wheat bread slices with mayonnaise
Top 10 slices with equal portions of the cucumber mixture, then with equal portions watercress
Cover with remaining 10 slices of bread
